pages.text: Using an $(l:crafts/cores)Animation Core$(), you're able to animate a Block of Redstone into a loyal servant. The Cube is immune to flames and lava and will headbutt any foes it detects.

There's also another feature of the cube that makes it immensely helpful for mining. Shift-right clicking on them with an ore, metal or pickaxe-able blocks will cause them register it, which will cause them to start glowing yellow the closer they are to that specific block. Shift-right click on them with an empty hand to unregister their block.
